name: ROAD TRIP (hit2key)
description:
Originally created for a school project, ROAD TRIP is a game about exploring a mysterious, abstract environment where everything is described through text. A brief pilgrimage to a strange world that communicates things differently. Takes roughly 5-10 minutes to complete.

ROAD TRIP features:

  • A compact, minimalist town to explore
  • Tons of flavor text
  • Simple, information-based puzzles (no switches to hit or keys to collect)
  • A quaint, ambient soundtrack
  • The Truth, hidden somewhere in the town

This is the first game I've ever published on any platform, so please let me know if you encounter any issues.
